comments.content:
It looks like an expanded(?) **[Bodoni Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173744/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Bodoni%20Poster%20-%20Regular&fid=ee4b2f157d35e0f9394de451665c8ac7&fsize=60&text=LARGE%20ON%20COLLECTION&wrap=2)**
